Otachan buys Cosplay! How could this possibly go wrong...
Welcome to our new Short Series! Otachan! Kuso Douga.
We decided to make a Bonus Episode to keep you busy whilst you wait for our production team to stop crying and make Episode 5 ğŸ’œ

Welcome to our new series Otachan! Kuso Douga! We hope you enjoyed it! This won't be taking over the mainline Otachan! series and is more of a fun bit of world building we enjoyed doing whilst we worked on Episode 5! We hope this makes the wait a little less boring! Thank you for always being so patient and thank you so much for your support.
We're still working on Episode 5! Ganbatte!

You make this show possible.
